page.title: 06A day in the life of Susan
page.content: I got up at 8.15 this morning.I got out of bed and got dressed,had a wash and brushed my teeth.I went downstairs and watched televison while my breakfast was doing.For my breakfast I had a bowl of rice crispies and two slices of toast and a cup of tea,then went for Nicola.We were on our way to school when the bell rang.When we got into class we got our hymn books and went into hymn practice.Afterwards in class we practiced our play then did Peak Maths.At 12.00 it was dinner time.I had crisps and cobs.Nicola and I walked back to school.We all had a talk then we wrote this.At play we played crocodiles.Then we finished this and finished our map.At quarter to four we went home for tea. At 6.00 I went to St.John's first Aid.I got home at 7.45 and watched television until bedtime at 9.30.
